name: Responsive Paginate
tagline: Responsive Paginate turns a bunch of HTML anchor tags into a responsive data pager.
body:
Responsive Paginate =============== Responsive Paginate turns a bunch of HTML anchor tags into a responsive data pager that looks like this: ![alt tag](http://i.imgur.com/zGVwfO0.jpg?1) A plugin for [jQuery](http://jquery.com/). ### Usage #### Add the style sheet to your HTML document's head: ``` ... ``` #### In the body of your HTML document format your page links like this: ```
1 2 3 ... n
``` Using numbers isn't required, you can use whatever labels you want. To tell responsivePaginate which page should be marked selected, add 'data-selected="true"' to its anchor tag. #### Bootstrap the responsivePaginate script at the end of your HTML document like this: ``` ... ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
